fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Fucking shank a player during the night, dealing an Astral Basic Attack to them

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have access to all private channels, evil faction chats, and jailor/wisteria-like chats.
- The first two times you are lynched, you are instead not.
- 2 Autovests

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the Town lose the game.
